roleset.name: illogical, unreasonable
roleset.note: IRRATIONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from irrational.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: ... the only thing is how irrational it-1 has come *PRO*-1 to be , and how many economically affordable houses have been allocated to rich ones " with power and wealth " .

roleset.name: not expressible as the quotient of two integers
roleset.note: IRRATIONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from irrational.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: So if a number was irrational, but its square root was rational, then the original number must have been rational.
